$metadata.name: Altitude Design System
$metadata.description: Framework-agnostic design tokens for Figma, Greenlight/WordPress, and Elementor

colorPrimitives.$description: Tailwind CSS color palette - raw color values

spacing.$description: 4px/8px grid spacing scale (Tailwind-style naming) - WordPress preset spacing properties consume these values

fontSize.$description: Typography scales with Major Second (1.125) and Major Third (1.25)

majorSecond.$description: Conservative scale - smaller contrast between sizes

majorThird.$description: Expressive scale - higher contrast between sizes

color.$description: Semantic color tokens that reference color primitives

light.$description: Light mode semantic colors - these are the source of truth that WordPress consumes

radius.$description: Semantic border radius tokens - WordPress custom properties consume these values

shadow.$description: Semantic shadow tokens - WordPress custom properties consume these values

layout.$description: Layout tokens - WordPress style properties consume these values

button.$description: Button component tokens - WordPress custom properties consume these values

card.$description: Card component tokens - WordPress custom properties consume these values

input.$description: Input component tokens - WordPress custom properties consume these values

$wordpress.$description: WordPress/Greenlight adapter configuration - WordPress variables CONSUME design system tokens (design system is source of truth)
$wordpress.philosophy: The design system (Figma â†’ CSS) is the single source of truth. WordPress preset and custom variables are configured to consume these values via var() references.

$figma.$description: Figma-specific configuration for variable collections and modes
